data.name: VTuber Editor
data.detailed_description:
VTuber Editor, a 3D sandbox editor tool, can quickly show personalized actions, expressions, special effects and other effects through simple building block programming, so that more creators can release their creativity.

Our VTuber Editor tool, produced by live3d, the animation works in the application are synchronized with live 3D's free live broadcast product, vtuber maker, to provide higher quality live broadcast effects for vtubers.

At present, the application shares an account with the vtuber maker, and you can log in directly through the vtuber maker account.

Our core strengths:
1. Visual programming, support real-time preview
2. Efficient development, through the placement of source code building blocks to complete the editing work
3. Rich animation effects trigger events to meet the needs of various scenes
4. Built in rich action, expression, special effects resources, free combination, enabling creativity.

Product plan
Vtuber editor --- provides flexible programmable mode, which can provide more creativity in action, expression and special effects
Vtuber maker --- easy to use, providing a simpler live broadcast solution

At present, the product is still in the development stage. Welcome to join our community and provide more comments and feedback
Email: service@live3d.io
Discord：https://discord.gg/CaxThpY
Twitter: https://twitter.com/VTuber_Maker
QQ Group: 414669952
Website: https://live3d.io

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570 3.20GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX360 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
